name: Dim (Myugii)
description:
The Dim are coming! you have 10 sec every night to craft weapons, objects and traps to fend off their draught. 

Controls:

MovementADAttack/CraftShiftJumpSpace

First jam entry! The game isn't much but I'm glad I got something out. I start the jam late and now have to end early because of work... I was going to give up and just not submit but, I was like "what heck I can always take it down" lol. Enjoy what every idea of a game you get from this.
